alert.note: Alert for Delta; Dickinson; Gogebic; Iron; Menominee; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 5:05AM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Blizzard conditions are possible at times late this afternoon and tonight, especially closer to the lakeshore in Menominee County. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 15 inches, greatest around Menominee and in the higher terrain from Ironwood to the Porcupine Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central Upper and western Upper Michigan. * WHEN...From 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ this morning to 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While snow on Saturday will be light across southern Upper Michigan with accumulations no more than 1 to 2 inches, lake enhanced snowfall off of Lake Superior will be moderate to heavy at times in Gogebic County, especially in the higher terrain from Ironwood to the Porcupine Mountains, and also in Delta County to the north of Rapid River.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Delta; Dickinson; Gogebic; Iron; Menominee; Southern Schoolcraft
